channel.title: Humour on The Great SummerEmacs Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Humour on The Great SummerEmacs Blog

item.title: Off to the Uranium Mines!
item.description:
Another IRC moment in #systemcrafters

<trev> oh well [12:42]

<alternateved> what's the verdict? [12:43]

<SummerEmacs> alternateved: GUILTY! GUILTY! GUILTY!!! üòÄ [12:45]

<alternateved> :D

<SummerEmacs> üë©üèº‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è

<SummerEmacs> off to the uranium mines with him!!! [12:46]

<SummerEmacs> ./force trev /join #uraniumminesforlifesentence [12:49]

<alternateved> haha [12:50]

<SummerEmacs> (defun magnifyTheScreams (magnify (erc-window (#uraniumminesforlifesentence,#systemcrafters)) (100))) [12:51]

<SummerEmacs> muahahahaha

<SummerEmacs> yes i‚Ä¶learned elisp to commit evil. [12:52]

<alternateved> You could setup apheleia

<daviwil> lol, SummerEmacs I'm glad you're around regularly again
item.content:
Another IRC moment in #systemcrafters

<trev> oh well [12:42]

<alternateved> what's the verdict? [12:43]

<SummerEmacs> alternateved: GUILTY! GUILTY! GUILTY!!! üòÄ [12:45]

<alternateved> :D

<SummerEmacs> üë©üèº‚Äç‚öñÔ∏è

<SummerEmacs> off to the uranium mines with him!!! [12:46]

<SummerEmacs> ./force trev /join #uraniumminesforlifesentence [12:49]

<alternateved> haha [12:50]

<SummerEmacs> (defun magnifyTheScreams (magnify (erc-window (#uraniumminesforlifesentence,#systemcrafters)) (100))) [12:51]

<SummerEmacs> muahahahaha

<SummerEmacs> yes i‚Ä¶learned elisp to commit evil. [12:52]

<alternateved> You could setup apheleia

<daviwil> lol, SummerEmacs I'm glad you're around regularly again

<SummerEmacs> lol

<SummerEmacs> sorry i'm having some good wine with my lunch üòÄ

<alternateved> For that sweet sweet automatic indenting and formatting [12:53]

<daviwil> Please continue

<SummerEmacs> well i finished dhe lunch i'm still enjoying the wine üòÄ

<alternateved> yeah, good to have you back SummerEmacs

item.title: Computer Languages List
item.description:
From an IRC moment in #systemcrafters

<SummerEmacs> C: Beautiful, fundamental, elegant

<SummerEmacs> C++: twisted, ugly, aberration

<SummerEmacs> C#: Abomination, child of hell, evil.

<SummerEmacs> Lisp: Elegant, majestic, simpliciy

<SummerEmacs> FORTRAN: Cold, statistical, inelegant.

<SummerEmacs> COBOL: Crude, old, gnarled.

<SummerEmacs> Javascript: Ugly, foul, filthy

<SummerEmacs> Haskell: Incomprehensible, powerful, niche

<SummerEmacs> Go: Base, mongrel, imposter.

<SummerEmacs> Zig: Unknown, power, fledgling

<SummerEmacs> Nim: Masquerader, fraud, sham

<SummerEmacs> Python: Rigid, useful, practical
item.content:
From an IRC moment in #systemcrafters

<SummerEmacs> C: Beautiful, fundamental, elegant

<SummerEmacs> C++: twisted, ugly, aberration

<SummerEmacs> C#: Abomination, child of hell, evil.

<SummerEmacs> Lisp: Elegant, majestic, simpliciy

<SummerEmacs> FORTRAN: Cold, statistical, inelegant.

<SummerEmacs> COBOL: Crude, old, gnarled.

<SummerEmacs> Javascript: Ugly, foul, filthy

<SummerEmacs> Haskell: Incomprehensible, powerful, niche

<SummerEmacs> Go: Base, mongrel, imposter.

<SummerEmacs> Zig: Unknown, power, fledgling

<SummerEmacs> Nim: Masquerader, fraud, sham

<SummerEmacs> Python: Rigid, useful, practical

<SummerEmacs> Rust: Treacherous, fraud, subversive

<SummerEmacs> Java: Contrived, failure, useless

<SummerEmacs> Assembler: Foundational, obscure, curt
